steps.name: Heat & Oil
steps.action: Heat the pan and oil it

steps.name: Steak on
steps.action: Put the steak on and sear it

steps.name: Sear other side
steps.action: Flip the steak and sear other side

steps.name: Butter it
steps.action: Lower the heat and Give a butter shower to add flavor

steps.name: Add rosemary
steps.action: Add the herb and keep the butter shower

steps.name: Resting
steps.action: Put the steak on a cooling rack and leave it
